title: Dl Hughley Interview and More
itunes:title: Dl Hughley Interview and More
description:
Monday 11/05 - Today on the show we had comedian/ radio host Dl Hughley pulled up on us and spoke about white people wearing black face, black culture, growth and more. Also, Hughley spoke on not being afraid of letting is children know about is past, which led us to open up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners let were ashame or not ashame to tell their kids about their past. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a local marching band who spelled out a racially charged word. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 11/05 - Today on the show we had comedian/ radio host Dl Hughley pulled up on us and spoke about white people wearing black face, black culture, growth and more. Also, Hughley spoke on not being afraid of letting is children know about is past, which led us to open up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners let were ashame or not ashame to tell their kids about their past. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a local marching band who spelled out a racially charged word. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
